xwikidoc.title: DocumentationWelcome
xwikidoc.content:
#** * Welcome text for welcome block on the documentation page * @translate This page requires full translation * @type content * @refactored ludovic *# Use this tab to share documents relevant to the workings of your group. You can create new wiki pages or upload file attachments. All types are listed below.
Any materials you create and share here do not exist in the Curriki repository, so they do not have information settings and can't be located by searching or browsing Curriki.
When contributing, developing, and/or organizing curricula, use the Curriculum tab so that your teaching and learning materials reside in the Curriki repository and can be easily discovered by the global education community.
